options.name: Scroll of Conquest
options.description: Friendly units within 6" of the bearer must reroll failed Charge Range rolls.

options.name: Banner of Unity
options.description: Whenever the bearer's unit is targeted by an Order, it may immediately give that same Order (for free) to up to two Support Units within 8" of the its unit.

options.name: Marksman's Pennant
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Stand and Shoot.

options.name: Winter Cloak
options.description: The bearer gains Aegis(3+, against Flaming Attacks),Aegis(5+),Distracting(1). The wearer automatically fails all Regeneration Saves.

options.name: Locket of Sunna
options.description: When , choose one enemy Character model part in base contact with the wearer's unit. During this Round of Combat the chosen model part suffers: -2 Att, -2 Off, -2 Str, and -2 AP.

options.name: Exemplar's Flame
options.description: The bearer can cast Corruption of Tin (Alchemy) as a Bound Spell(5+).

options.name: Ullor's Horn
options.description: Enemy units within 8" of the bearer lose the Charging Momentum Agi bonus as well as the +1 Combat Score bonus from Charging.

options.name: Hammer of Witches
options.description: Afflict(-1 Channel). After determining the number of hits, one single hit chosen by the attacker, has its Str and AP multiplied by two, and gains Multiple Wounds(2).

options.name: Death Warrant
options.description: +X Att, +X Str, and +X AP, where X is the number of friendly Parent Units and Support Units of Height 1 (including the bearer's unit if applicable) Engaged in the same Combat as the wielder.

options.name: Imperial Seal
options.description: Arm is set to 6. +1 Dis. Fearless.

options.name: Blacksteel
options.description: Immune(Flaming Attacks). +1 Arm. If the wearer is without Mount, it gains an additional +1 Arm.

options.name: Battle Standard Bearer and Imperial Authority
Brace of Pistols (4+) and Fire on Impact
options.parsername: Brace of Pistols and Fire on Impact! (4+)
